welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nohfelden, Germany! Get ready to be enchanted by the charming countryside and immerse yourself in our rich history and culture. Enjoy your stay and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ramstein Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Ramstein Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ensheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all airlines at Frankfurt-Hahn Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zweibrücken Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
